tool_description: Get all required API's to create an amazing cricket live score application.
name: Star Selector Cricket Live Scores
title: Star Selector Cricket Live Scores

api_list.name: players/info
api_list.description: Get the details of the player

api_list.name: players/bowlingstats
api_list.description: Get the bowling statistics of the player in the series

api_list.name: teams/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://star-selector-cricket-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/api/teams/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "star-selector-cricket-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
